title: Chairman Schiff on President Biden Signing the HAVANA Act Into Law
summary: “Every day, Americans in our diplomatic corps, intelligence community, and armed services represent our nation’s interests abroad, making personal sacrifices in service of our nation. We are indebted to them, and we have an obligation to do everything we can to keep them safe and to protect their families. I was proud to sponsor the bipartisan HAVANA Act, and I am pleased that President Biden has ...
